line.text: The other two slight air and purging fire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Are both with thee wherever I abide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The first my thought the other my desire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: These present-absent with swift motion slide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For when these quicker elements are gone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In tender embassy of love to thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My life being made of four with two alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sinks down to death oppressed with melancholy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: By those swift messengers returned from thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who even but now come back again assured
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of thy fair health recounting it to me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This told I joy but then no longer glad
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I send them back again and straight grow sad
